QuestData.Title: Drag it Out of Them
QuestData.Description: It is our instinct to simply lash out at our attackers, but wisdom dictates another path. We should interrogate one of these quilboar invaders and learn all we can. Take this net, $n, and ensnare a quilboar pillager attacking our farm just west of here. Club the beast unconscious and bring him to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Grol'dom Net to ensnare a Razormane Pillager and drag it back to Togrik at Grol'dom Farm.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't be too harsh with our captive, he will still need his head attached to answer our questions.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh my. We want to question this quilboar, not tenderize him!
